item.description:
Min/Max: Min of 4, Max of 20 members

Event Fees: $2 event fee
Annual Members - FREE (Annual Membership = $11)
Guests: $2 event fee (up to 2 guests)

Ten Pin/Candlepin = $4.50 pp/per string
Shoes = $2.50

Details:

Hello Everyone -

Let's start off the new year with our first bowling event which has been quite successful in the past. This time let's try Westgate Lanes in Brockton which is a quick drive right off Route 24. Let's plan to meet about 7:15 or so and plan to bowl about 7:30 pm, Friday, January 29th at the Westgate Lanes.

There is a minimum of 4 Participants (Non-organizers) by noon on Thursday, January 28th.

Organizers: Susan (AO)

Please Note:

SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Carpool: There is no carpool for this event. Members should meet at Westgate Lanes. If you would like to carpool you may note where from in your RSVP comments and someone else may choose to contact you if they are also interested in carpooling.

RSVP Deadline: Thursday, January 28th @ 12:00 PM. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the front desk

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Westgate Lanes - Bowling
